Hi,

Does somebody know how to change the Science points in Science mode? I know that it should be somewhere in the Save folder->map name->persistent.sfs but I don't know how the science points are called in it.

Edited September 4, 2014 by rowns
You want to change what science is worth, or just rack up a bazillion points to max out the tech tree?

No need to edit the file directly, you can use the cheat menu.

At the Space Center scene (where all buildings are visible), press Alt-F12 to open the menu.

Press and hold Left Alt for 5 seconds.

Press the science buttons to add or remove science as desired.

(Instructions are for Windows, not sure about Linux or Mac)

Edit: Dang, Ninja'd

Open in notepad: Kerbal Space Program/saves/(Yoursave)/persistent.sfs

Search for "sci =" without quotations.

Change the value after the "=" sign.
